Posts.EditableText: I've been playing some old games by CJ592 (Sir Loin, Shiver Sword and As Darkness Falls). I tried to contact him/her by PM and through an email address given in his/her games but without success. Does anyone know anything about him/her?
Posts.HTML: I've been playing some old games by CJ592 (Sir Loin, Shiver Sword and As Darkness Falls). I tried to contact him/her by PM and through an email address given in his/her games but without success. Does anyone know anything about him/her?

Posts.EditableText:
I've also tried to contact CJ592 without success. I'm pretty sure it is a 'him' from the game content but no one seems to have made direct contact. In case you are interested, I re-implemented one of his games last year (Sir Loin I):
http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/M4a7-u7KyUKbTVHAqtXQ-g/sir-loin-and-the-coming-of-age-too
